channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Ip Man
channel.desc: A martial artist is forced to leave his home due to a war in 1937. In a twist of fate, he ends up establishing a school to train others in self-defence.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Train to Busan Presents: Peninsula
channel.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Taking of Pelham 123
channel.desc: A subway dispatcher's day is thrown into chaos when four armed men hijack the subway train and take the commuters as hostages. They demand USD 10 million from the mayor as ransom.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Matilda
channel.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Shadow in the Cloud
channel.desc: A WWII pilot is assigned a secret mission to travel with confidential documents on a Boeing B-17 Flying Fortress. However, she soon has to deal with an evil presence on board.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Our Kind of Traitor
channel.desc: Perry and his wife go on a holiday to save their marriage and come across Dima, a man who is involved with the mafia. They soon find themselves caught in the middle of a crisis.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
channel.desc: Lucian, a werewolf slave, convinces his Lycan compatriots to rebel against their vampire masters, who are led by Viktor, a powerful vampire elder. This leads to a full-fledged war between the two.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Replacement Killers
channel.desc: John Lee, a hitman, is hired to kill a cop's son. He is unable to accomplish his mission and decides to flee. However, his boss hires replacements to finish the task and kill John Lee.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Midnight Special
channel.desc: Roy Tomlin makes desperate efforts to protect his eight-year-old son, Alton, who possesses special powers, from a religious sect and officials of the FBI who are on a quest to capture him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Resident Evil
channel.desc: Two associates of an elite commando team fight an army of zombies controlled by an evil desktop computer in a genetic research facility.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: Shakti and Mukti Mohan recall the wonders of the previous performances. Later, the contestants showcase their talent as they compete for glorious victory.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dance With Me
channel.desc: Shakti Mohan and Mukti Mohan explain the theme to the participants. Later, the contestants showcase their single, duet and group performances.

channel.name: And Flix IN

channel.desc: The Mohan sisters return to deliver another eclectic dance performance while other dancers take the stage to showcase their moves. Later, the audience try to do the hook step challenge 2.0.
